name: quick-ai
title: Quick AI
description: Quick AI actions to help you with your work.
author: gabriel-moresco

commands.name: open-ai-chat
commands.title: Open AI Chat
commands.description: Open AI Chat with the prompt inputted on Raycast.

commands.name: translate-to-english
commands.title: Translate to English
commands.description: Translate the text from Portuguese to English.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
